item.title: Introduction
item.description:
About Me:

I am a postdoctoral fellow in the Department of Biomedical Informaticsat Harvard Medical School where I am mentored by Chirag Patel. Before coming to Harvard I was a Data Scientist at HelloWallet. I also have a PhD in mathematics from North Carolina State University.
